relevant_findings.heent: No scleral icterus, mucus membranes moist
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, nondistended, moderately tender in RLQ with guarding
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, warm and well perfused

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: There is a 3.4 x 1.6 cm fluid collection surrounding the appendix posterior to the cecum (previously 2.9 x 3.9 cm on CT). Edematous appearance of the cecum is most likely secondary to local inflammatory changes.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The fluid collection size increased from 2.9 x 3.9 cm to 3.4 x 1.6 cm.
